content: the mimosa headband features a braided cable flanked by mirrored cables on a reverse stockinette background the i-cord edges give the headband a finished look and prevent the side edges from curling the pattern is an 8-row repeat the headband is knitted flat and the shorter edges are sewn together forming a twist and hiding the seam finished measurements - width 10cm 4″ wide - circumference 50cm 19 75″
